p: In order to determine whether nanoparticles or high molecular compounds are responsible for the interference, the chosen extract was subjected to three steps of filtration. The stock solution of 5 was filtrated through syringe PTFE (Whatman, Little Chalfont, UK) 13 mm filters with decreasing pore size (450 nm, 200 nm and 100 nm). After each step filtrate was stored and used for bioassays and chromatographic determination.
